title: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 just got a powerful new Android rival that's over $500 cheaper
description: The Nubia Fold almost sounds too good to be true, packing an elite processor and massive AMOLED display for under $1,200.
content: We've seen a few new foldable Android phones arrive this year, including the Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 and the Honor Magic V5, but it looks like we're getting one more before the year is out. I'm talki… [+2186 chars]
